io.vertx.maven

Interface Resolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResolverImpl

    public interface Resolver
    Interface implemented by resolver. Resolvers are responsible for the resolution of the dependencies.
    Author:
    Clement Escoffier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Resolver create()
      Creates a Resolver using the default implementation and default options.
      static Resolver create(ResolverOptions options)
      Creates a Resolver using the default implementation and the given options.
      List<org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact> resolve(String dependency, ResolutionOptions options)
      Resolves a dependency.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        List<org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact> resolve(String dependency,
                                                   ResolutionOptions options)
        Resolves a dependency.
        Parameters:
        dependency - the dependency, using the GACV form.
        options - the resolution options
        Returns:
        the list of resolved artifacts. The list contains a single element if the transitive dependencies are not resolved. The first artifact of the list if the artifact for the given dependency.

      • create

        static Resolver create()
        Creates a Resolver using the default implementation and default options.
        Returns:
        the created Resolver.

      • create

        static Resolver create(ResolverOptions options)
        Creates a Resolver using the default implementation and the given options.
        Parameters:
        options - the resolver options
        Returns:
        the created Resolver.
